alert.note: Alert for City of Hyder (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 3:01PM AKST until December 25 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SIGNIFICANT SNOWFALL FOR PARTS OF SE AK THROUGH CHRISTMAS... Multiple frontal bands will pass over the panhandle through the weekend bringing periods of snow. Heavy snow is moving north this afternoon and will be over the northern inner channels tonight. The southern areas have reported from 4 to 8 inches of snow so far with more on the way before becoming a wintry mix or all rain by morning. A break or decrease in snowfall rates remains on track in the morning over the north as the second frontal band tracks into the southern panhandle Saturday morning. This front will continue to move north into the northern areas by the afternoon. This front will bring another round of snow and a chance of freezing rain for the central inner channels with the south changing to all rain through Saturday. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Storm total snow accumulations of 20 to 25 inches. * WHERE...City of Hyder. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall rates expected through Friday evening and again Saturday mid morning. A period of light freezing rain is possible late Saturday night into early Sunday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
